Producer: Maren Olson, Carlos Velazquez, Jordan Galland, Doug Weiser
Production Co: Traction Media, ODD NY, Ravenous Films (II), Off Hollywood Pictures
Synopsis: After an exorcism frees her soul, a young woman (Louisa Krause) attends Spirit Possession Anonymous and meets a fellow victim (Whitney Able) who wants her demon back.
Title: Ava's Possessions
